#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <string>

using namespace std;

int isDiv( string s ) {
	
	int len, i, n = 0;
	
	len = s.length();
	
	for( i = 0;i < len;i++ ) {
		n = ( ( n << 3 ) + ( n << 1 ) + s[ i ] - '0' );
		n = n % 17;
	}
	
	return ( n % 17 );
}

int main() {
	
	int t, n;
	
	scanf("%d", &t );
	cin.ignore();
	
	while( t-- ) {
		
		string s;
		cin >> s;
		
		if( isDiv( s ) == 0 )
			printf("YES\n");
		else
			printf("NO\n");
		
	}
	return 0;
}
